feed.title: Lac La Biche - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Lac La Biche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:55 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 3:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -19.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -23.8°C
Wind: SSE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
